_access_restricted: Access denied. Make sure to have proper pivilege
_account_pending: Your account has not been enabled. To do so, you have to click on the activation link that has been sent to you by e-mail. If you did not receive or have lost the link, click here
_act_error: Your Drumee space activation has failed. May be there has been a too long delay between the subscription and the activation. In that case, please, click on the following link to receive a new activation e-mail.
_data_error: Sorry, tha data you sent could not be read.
_duplicate_entry: %s already exists, please chose another one
_email_already_exist: The e-mail address is already in use. Please choose another one
_email_not_found: We are sorry, <u>%s</u> could not be found.
_fonder_account: This account is owned by a founder
_forbiden_action: The action you have submitted is not allowed
_improper_data: We are sorry, the request you have submitted contains improper data. We will everything to investigate and fix the mess
_internal_error: Oops ! An internal error has occured. Our team is now aware of this and will take proper action to fix the mess.
_invalid_activation_link: We are sorry, the activation link you have just used is not/no more a valid one. Please, check it has not already been used. You can get a new link by clicking here : %s
_invalid_key: The key you've sent is not or no more valid. Please, sent a new request
_invitation_failed: An internal error has occured. Your invitation has not been sent.
_operation_failed: The operation did not succeded. Our technical team has been informed.
_page_not_found: Oops, could not find the hashtag %s!
_password_invalid: Your password is not valid. Please, enter a new one.
_password_unconsistent: Your password is not consistent. Please, enter a new one.
_permission_denied: You don't have the permission to run this operation. Send a request to the person in charge of this.
_require_login: Please, sign in to use this feature
_session_expired: Your session has expired. Please reconnect again.
_session_rejected: We are sorry, your session has encounted an erro. Please, log in again.
_unimplemented_op: We are sorry, the operation '%s' has not been yet implemented
_unknown_error: Yeah, we're certain it's not going to be running well!
_user_already_exist: The ident '%s' is not available. Please chose another one.
